name: VHS PLATFORM: 2D
description:
VHS is a very difficult precision game. In this game, you'll have to go through obstacles that have been carefully placed in order to prevent you from reaching the end. Do you think you can go through everything and zero VHS? I dare you to try!!

Game Features


  • 50 challenging stages.
  • Intuitive and simple interface.
  • Minimalist.
  • Trial and error.
  • Very difficult.
  • Glitchs.
  • Retro

Main mechanics


  • Wall jump: Grab the black walls and jump.
  • Dash: Destroy gravity and traverse paths accurately with our two-way dash.
  • Variable jump: The stronger, the higher.
